Examples
================

Generating periodic potential & hamiltonian
-------------------------------------------

.. math::
   \begin{eqnarray}
   V(x)=\sum_{i=1}^3V_i\left(\cos^2(\pi (x+\phi_i))-1\right)\\
   H_{ij}(k)=\frac{(k+G_i)^2}{2}\delta_{ij}+\hat{V}(G_i-G_j)
   \end{eqnarray}

.. code::
